title: Consider Data Replication
text: Which enhancement might require duplicating data across multiple locations?

title: Impact of Copies on Storage
text: How does replicating the same data in multiple locations affect storage needs?

title: Assessing Storage Needs
text: Among the options, which requires the most duplication of existing data?

title: Understanding Metadata
text: What is metadata and how does adding it to a trip itinerary impact storage? Compare it with making multiple copies.

hintAnswer: Making copies of the user's trip itinerary in $$6$$ data centers around the world
title: Final Answer
text: Choose the feature that requires the greatest data storage increase.
choices: Storing a list of other user IDs (up to 10) that are allowed to see the itinerary
Storing the $$\frac{latitude}{longitude}$$ information for each location in the trip itinerary
Making copies of the user's trip itinerary in $$6$$ data centers around the world
Adding metadata about when the user last updated the trip itinerary
